translation.about: TimeScale Creator Online enables you to explore and create charts of any portion of the geologic time scale from an extensive suite of global and regional events in Earth History. The internal database suite encompasses over 20,000 biologic, geomagnetic, sea-level, stable isotope, and other events.

login.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up
login.reset-password: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.signin: Already have an account? Sign in
signup.email-sent: Email sent. Please check your email to verify your account.

loading.time: this could take more than a minute

load-dialog.message: This will overwrite any changes you've made!

interval.helper-text: Base age should be older than top age

checkboxs.skip-empty-columns: Gray out (and do not draw) columns which do not have data on the selected time interval
checkboxs.global-priority: Enabled Global Priority Filtering for block columns
checkboxs.stage-background: Enabled stage background for event columns
checkboxs.conserve-chart: Conserve Chart Space in Family Tree Plotting (Not implemented)
checkboxs.hide-block-labels: Hide block labels based on priority
checkboxs.use-suggested-age-spans: Do not use the Data-Pack's suggested age span

tooltip.not-in-range: Data not included in time range

font.notes1: These are the default systemwide fonts.
font.notes2: Changing one here will affect the entire chart.
font.notes3: NOTE: These fonts can be changed on a column by column basis by using the Font button for each column

map-points.not-avaliable: No Map Points available for this datapack

datapacks.see-info-guidance: Click a datapack to see more information!
datapacks.add-datapack-guidance: Add a datapack by clicking the checkbox

upload-form.title: Upload Your Own Datapack
upload-form.name: Datapack Name
upload-form.name-placeholder: Enter a name for your datapack.
upload-form.author: Authored By
upload-form.description-placeholder: Enter a description for your datapack.
upload-form.contact-helper-text: (OPTIONAL) If you would like others to contact you about this datapack
upload-form.notes-placeholder: Enter notes for the datapack here
upload-form.notes-helper-text: (OPTIONAL) Generally notes are settings recommendations/How to use your datapack most efficiently

chart.no-chart-yet: You have not made a chart yet

confirm-datapack-change.title: Confirm Datapack Selection Change
confirm-datapack-change.message: You have unsaved changes! Do you want to save your changes?

confirm-changes.message: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?

errors.title: Error
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_ERROR: Server response error. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_DATAPACK_INFO: Invalid datapack info received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_PRESET_INFO: Invalid preset info received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_PATTERN_INFO: Invalid pattern info received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_TIME_SCALE: Invalid time scale received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_DATAPACK_CONFIG: Datapacks were not properly set. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_SVG_READY_RESPONSE: Invalid SVG ready response received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_SETTINGS_RESPONSE: Invalid settings response received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_CHART_RESPONSE: Invalid chart response received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_PATH: The requested path was invalid. Please ensure the path is correct.
errors.INVALID_USER_DATAPACKS: Invalid user datapacks received from server. Please try again later.
errors.INVALID_PUBLIC_DATAPACKS: Invalid public datapacks received from server. Please try again later.
errors.NO_DATAPACK_FILE_FOUND: No datapack file found. Please upload a datapack file first.
errors.DATAPACK_FILE_NAME_TOO_LONG: Datapack file name is too long. Please shorten the file name.
errors.UNRECOGNIZED_DATAPACK_EXTENSION: Unrecognized datapack extension. File must be of type .dpk, .mdpk, .map, .txt. Please upload a valid datapack file.
errors.UNRECOGNIZED_DATAPACK_FILE: Unrecognized datapack file. Please upload a valid datapack file.
errors.UNFINISHED_DATAPACK_UPLOAD_FORM: Please finish the datapack upload form before attempting to upload the file.
errors.DATAPACK_ALREADY_EXISTS: Datapack already exists. Please upload a datapack with a unique title.
errors.NO_DATAPACKS_SELECTED: No datapacks selected. Please select at least one datapack to generate.
errors.NO_COLUMNS_SELECTED: No columns selected. Please select at least one column to generate.
errors.IS_BAD_RANGE: Base age must be greater than the top age.
errors.INVALID_MAPPACK_INFO: Invalid mappack info received from server. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_LOGIN_SERVER: Unable to login due to server error. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_LOGIN_GOOGLE_CREDENTIAL: Unable to login with Google credentials. Please try again.
errors.UNABLE_TO_LOGIN_USERNAME_OR_PASSWORD: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
errors.UNABLE_TO_LOGIN_EXISTING_USER: User with that email already exists. Please log in or sign up with a different email.
errors.UNABLE_TO_LOGOUT: Unable to logout. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_SIGNUP_SERVER: Unable to sign up due to server error. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_SIGNUP_USERNAME_OR_EMAIL: Email or username already exists. Please try again with a different email or username.
errors.INVALID_FORM: Invalid form. Please ensure all fields are filled out correctly.
errors.UNABLE_TO_VERIFY_ACCOUNT: Your email is not verified. Please verify your email first. If you did not receive an email, please resend.
errors.ALREADY_VERIFIED_ACCOUNT: Account is already verified. Please log in.
errors.UNABLE_TO_VERIFY_ACCOUNT_SERVER: Unable to verify account due to server error. Please try again later.
errors.TOKEN_EXPIRED_OR_INVALID: Your token is either invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
errors.UNABLE_TO_SEND_EMAIL: Unable to send email. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_RESET_PASSWORD: Unable to reset password. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_RESET_EMAIL: Unable to reset email. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_LOGIN_ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Your account has been locked. Please check your email for more information or contact support.
errors.UNABLE_TO_RECOVER_ACCOUNT: Unable to recover account. Please contact support for more information.
errors.NOT_LOGGED_IN: You are not logged in. Please log in to access this page.
errors.USER_DATAPACK_FILE_NOT_FOUND_FOR_DOWNLOA: The datapack requested was not found on the server. Please try again later or contact our support team.
errors.INCORRECT_ENCRYPTION_HEADER: Unable to encrypt the file, please try again later.
errors.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You have made too many requests. Please try again later.
errors.COOKIE_REJECTED: You must accept cookies to sign in.
errors.UNRECOGNIZED_IMAGE_FILE: Unrecognized image extension. Please upload a valid image file.
errors.UPLOAD_PROFILE_PICTURE_FAILED: Unable to upload profile picture. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_CHANGE_USERNAME: Unable to change username. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_DELETE_PROFILE: Unable to delete profile. Please try again later.
errors.USERNAME_TAKEN: Username is already taken. Please try a different username.
errors.UNABLE_TO_READ_FILE_OR_EMPTY_FILE: Unable to read file or file is empty. Please try again.
errors.FETCH_USERS_FAILED: Unable to fetch users for admin display. Please try again later.
errors.ADMIN_ADD_USER_FAILED: Unable to add user. Please try again later.
errors.SERVER_TIMEOUT: Server timed out. Please try again later.
errors.SERVER_BUSY: Server is too busy. Please try again later.
errors.ADMIN_DELETE_USER_FAILED: Unable to delete user. Please try again later.

errors.ADMIN_CANNOT_DELETE_ROOT_DATAPACK: Cannot delete root datapack. Ask server admin for assistance.
errors.INVALID_SERVER_DATAPACK_REQUEST: Invalid server datapack request. Please try again later.
errors.SERVER_FILE_METADATA_ERROR: Server file metadata error. Please try again later.
errors.USER_DELETE_DATAPACK_FAILED: Unable to delete user datapack. Please try again later.
errors.UNABLE_TO_PROCESS_DATAPACK_CONFIG: Failed to process datapack config. Please try again later.

errors.ADMIN_EMAIL_INVALID: Invalid email. Please fix the email and try again.
errors.ADMIN_WORKSHOP_FIELDS_EMPTY: You must provide at least one field to add users to a workshop.
errors.UNRECOGNIZED_EXCEL_FILE: Unrecognized Excel file. Please upload a valid Excel file.
errors.SERVER_DATAPACK_ALREADY_EXISTS: Server datapack already exists. Please upload a unique datapack (different title).
errors.ADMIN_WORKSHOP_START_AFTER_END: The start date must be before the end date.

errors.ADMIN_WORKSHOP_ALREADY_EXISTS: Workshop with that title and dates already exists. Please try again.
errors.ADMIN_FETCH_WORKSHOPS_FAILED: Unable to fetch workshops. Please try again later.
errors.ADMIN_DELETE_WORKSHOP_FAILED: Unable to delete workshop. Please try again later.
errors.ADMIN_WORKSHOP_NOT_FOUND: Workshop not found on server, it has likely ended or been deleted.

errors.USER_FETCH_DATAPACK_FAILED: Failed to fetch user datapack. Please try again later.
errors.ADMIN_FETCH_PRIVATE_DATAPACKS_FAILED: Failed to fetch private datapacks. Please try again later.
errors.USER_REPLACE_DATAPACK_FILE_FAILED: Failed to replace user datapack file. Please try again later.
